pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 1 from Team Explorer

content.raw:
Thanks @{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} ! Can you confirm these sensor characteristics are:  
RGBD camera - 640x480, 5m range  
Lidar - 75m range, 360 degree horizontal, \+/-15 degree vertical FOV  
Also, can the gas sensor plugin be added to this platform \(as it will be for X1-X4\)?
content.html:
Thanks @Addisu Z. Taddese ! Can you confirm these sensor characteristics are:
RGBD camera - 640x480, 5m range
Lidar - 75m range, 360 degree horizontal, +/-15 degree vertical FOV
Also, can the gas sensor plugin be added to this platform (as it will be for X1-X4)?
